backend/main.mo: Actor canister managing presale state, contributions, allocations, and presale status queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented frontend files to presale-related feature requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short descriptions of all major frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based neon theme styles and color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React root component assembling all presale sections with animated neon background.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright info and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Displays aggregated contributor data in a neon-styled table with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: Shows a 24‑hour countdown timer using the useCountdown24h hook.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Displays the presale deposit address with copy‑to‑clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Hero section with hero image, animated neon headline, tagline, and feature cards.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: UI section explaining steps for contributing ICP to the presale and showing key presale details.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Displays presale progress, ICP totals, and end status using data from usePresaleStatus.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Wraps countdown, presale parameters, progress bar, and deposit address into a single status section.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Shows tokenomics info and a FAQ section using MAX_SUPPLY and static presale details.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Defines presale constants including deposit address, cap, max supply, and polling interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Fetches all presale contributors periodically using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Provides a 24‑hour countdown timer with hours, minutes, and seconds remaining.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, and stored identities through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Periodically fetches presale status data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme CSS variables, neon color utilities, and multiple custom animation utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates contribution records by address, summing amounts and sorting by latest timestamp.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors from CSS variables, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, architectural notes, and the overall presale site specification.
